if-code-question9_key3: People **5 years and above** in age can go to school.
if-code-question9_key4: People **18 years and above** in age can vote in elections.
if-code-question9_key5: People **21 years and above** in age can drive a car.
if-code-question9_key6: People **24 years and above** in age can marry.
if-code-question9_key7: People **25 years and above** in age can legally drink.
